oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Edgehill Village Apartments Under Construction, 1970
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of the Edgehill Village Apartments under construction, January 1970. The public housing project was designed by Bernard L. Weinstein & Associates Architects, and were built as part of the Edgehill Urban Renewal Project (Project Tenn. R-69). Photographed by R.W. Ray of the Nashville Housing Authority. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nashville Housing Authority (Nashville, Tenn.);
